Reviews.Title: Okay camera
Reviews.Author: RetiredProf
Reviews.Content: I was introduced to this line of cameras when a friend was using a S3300. I was impressed with the 30X zoom and the apparent quality of the photos he was taking. By the time I got around to looking into a purchase, the S4500 was available for less money. It seems to be about the same hardware. I like the idea of using rechargeable NiMH batteries and was willing to accept a larger body to accommodate them. Once I started using the camera however, I was disappointed in the quality of the images and video I was getting. I have a feeling I will have to mess with the manual settings to get things just right, as a few other reviews have stated. Other than that, which is a big deal in itself, the features of the camera are impressive. I am not sure it was worth giving up the small form of the point and shoot that it replaced, other than the 30X zoom. The extras that came with it made it a great deal. I would recommend this camera to anyone looking for a 30X zoom and willing to put up with the larger size and the need to adjust the settings to get a good shot.

Reviews.Title: Great beginner camera
Reviews.Author: MikeD
Reviews.Content: I love the zoom on this. I have taken a ton of great pictures with this camera. I'm very much a beginner but I think this camera has a great price to performance ratio. I'm in Afghanistan on deployment and on convoys I will take pictures of things. We can be moving and the pictures turn out great. I don't like the 1.5sec delay in between shots.

Reviews.Title: nice...
Reviews.Author: BLT
Reviews.Content: Camera should come with a manual, not a cd with instructions. Shutter speed is slower than I would have liked. Batteries don't last through nearly as many photos as advertised.

Reviews.Title: Great all around camera!
Reviews.Author: CHRIS E> "chrisemme1"
Reviews.Content: Did a lot of research on the new (bridge cameras) and found all of the reviews helpful.How can you beat a point and shoot camera with a 30x zoom for under 150.00! Great guidance menu and plenty of options no need for additional lenses and at the price your not going to leave it at home you will take it with you willingly not worrying about taking a $500 plus camera on ventures my wife loves to take photos and her other camera is a lumix g3c and it takes amazing pics but for the days out on the road (motorcycle rides) the s4500 will be the one! Once the weather breaks we will be taking it with us and will update this review!

Reviews.Title: Perfect gift bundle
Reviews.Author: Jon
Reviews.Content: I bought this bundle for my wife for Christmas.  She loved it.  The 16GB SDHC card that's included allows her to take numerous pictures, and she does.  The rechargeable battery pack surprised me by having a 12v adapter, perfect for family vacations.  You can charge your batteries on the go.

Reviews.Title: Great value
Reviews.Author: William Mathews
Reviews.Content: Poor man's cannon rebel. with the bundle, best price around. I wanted a camera with a viewfinder as LCD screens are a joke in sun light.

Reviews.Title: Gift for brother.
Reviews.Author: Bankole  N. Salami
Reviews.Content: This has been a wonderful gift. Takes good pictures. Durable and easy to use. Wonderful little machine for a reasonable price.

Reviews.Title: Good camera
Reviews.Author: vania r.
Reviews.Content: I am very happy with my new camera.  It is easy to use, has excelent zoom and it's light.  The camera has several modes of shooting including the panorama mode.

Reviews.Title: Quick
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: Arrived sooner than I expected all in one box which impressed me was taking pictures within ten minutes of opening the box it only took that long cause I read the guide firdt

Reviews.Title: Great value
Reviews.Author: Randy Haines
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera based on internet reviews for a trip I was taking to South Africa.  Both my son and I used the camera, and overall, it was everything we had hoped for.  Easy to use, great telephoto lens, excellent picture quality.  The kit was a bonus.  If you are looking for a great bridge camera, this is it.

Reviews.Title: Very Nice Purchase, More Than Promised.
Reviews.Author: Carl R. Klemencic
Reviews.Content: Excellent Camera, Great Price. Very nice Pictures, as Promised, very Easy to Setup, Learn, and Use. Highly Recommended for great Satisfaction.

Reviews.Title: take real good pictures
Reviews.Author: mad Mike
Reviews.Content: i am not a photographer but the pictures this camera takes is by far some of the best pictures I have taken, real clear and zoom is wonderful. for the price I am not disappointed.

Reviews.Title: What I expected.
Reviews.Author: Ernani Pereira de Mattos
Reviews.Content: Very good zoom, and for a beginner is very easy to use, excellent inexpensive camera to take great pictures. I believe that soon I can upgrade to a more professional camera...

Reviews.Title: con todo
Reviews.Author: GLAMYR LANZ
Reviews.Content: Un producto que cumple mis necesidades.. con las tres B: bueno bonito y barato. Ame los accesorios y la camara me encanto

Reviews.Title: excellent camera
Reviews.Author: candymanizdman
Reviews.Content: It is what I expected. Takes great pictures and videos. Just found out 30x zoom too short for me. Prefer longer zoom. All in all good camera n preforms great. Price with bundle was good.

Reviews.Title: Very nice camema
Reviews.Author: michael f bradley
Reviews.Content: i wood recomand this produck to my friends and family....very nice.....was more then i expected......will be back to pursch more products from here....

Reviews.Title: Good camera for the price/bundle.
Reviews.Author: keith hall
Reviews.Content: This takes good pics it is a good starter camera, wish the resolution was higher but I guess that comes with more pixels. Probably will just be our everyday camera nothing to fancy. Very tiny tripod about 4 inches tall.

Reviews.Title: Fujifilm FinePix S4500 works great
Reviews.Author: Basil Boyd
Reviews.Content: It is what I was looking for. I will get more memory.  This will do the job I needed.  Now I need to fine a way to display my spots.

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: denofcubs
Reviews.Content: bought this to replace my old Minolta 4 pix,,,the pictures come out great, the camera is simple to use,,,I take it with me everywhere as I just might see a pictures of a 1000 words,,,

ProductInfo.Name: Fujifilm FinePix S4500 30x Optical Zoom 14 MP 3 inch LCD Digital Camera 16 GB Bundle
